attributes.action: REVIEW THE EXTORTIONIST COST OF BRINGING PETS INTO UK VIA HEATHROW.
attributes.background: TRAVEL WITH A PET OUT OF HEATHROW BY SOME AIRLINES - E.G. AEGEAN FROM HEATHROW TO ATHENS ONLY COST APRROX £120 BUT TO RETURN SAME PET ON SAME AIRLINE COSTS £700 BECAUSE OF UK REGULATIONS AND THE REQUIREMENT FOR THE PET TO TRAVEL AS 'ANIMAL CARGO' WHICH SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASES THE COSTS.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking for a specific change to the regulations.
